statements: SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule WHERE doctor_id = 200;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-01' AND appointment_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id FROM appointment_schedule ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule WHERE doctor_id = 1 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time DESC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, reminder_sent_patient FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT doctor_id, appointment_date FROM appointment_schedule WHERE reminder_sent_doctor = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT doctor_id, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule WHERE patient_id = 3 AND reminder_sent_patient = FALSE ORDER BY doctor_id ASC, appointment_time DESC
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, status FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 201 AND status = 'cancelled';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE recipient_type = 'doctor' AND reminder_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recipient_id, message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time < NOW() ORDER BY reminder_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status='scheduled';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT doctor_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(appointment_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) AS avg_waiting_time FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.reminder_id;
SELECT DISTINCT recipient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reminders FROM reminders GROUP BY recipient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_email FROM doctors WHERE doctor_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(appointment_id) as total_appointments FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;

SELECT patient_name, patient_email, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_type = 'Consultation';
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_type, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE recipient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE status='Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN doctors ON patients.patient_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE patients.appointment_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT appointment_id, status FROM appointments_history WHERE doctor_id = 2 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
